job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Looking for a System Engineer to help build and support the ultimate voice-based conversational AI. We’re looking for coders and creators with a refined code sense: people who’ve built cool things, but also enjoy scaling and operating those things, and who feel proud seeing their code run well in production.</p><p>The ideal candidates would have professional experience on a stack serving millions of users, be proficient with Python and/or Golang and have some amount of experience (either professional or personal) in NLP.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Desirable Skills Include: </strong>Microservices Architecture GoPythonML OpsShould be able to apply different tenants' configuration through code as well as tools.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Experience</strong>3-5 years of experience in working with infrastructure as code&nbsp;At least 1 year in Python or GolangComfortable developing, maintaining DevOps pipelinesStrong experience working with cloud services - AWS or GCP preferred Exposure to NLP/AI/ML is a huge plus</p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities</p><p>· Be part of on-call rotation to respond to urgent bugs or production outages</p><p>· Proactively identify and fix infrastructure bottlenecks&nbsp;</p><p>· Choosing tooling for and understanding of CI / CDGCP knowledge</p><p>· Kubernetes (In a production environment)DockerKnowledge of working in an Agile environment infrastructure As CodeDevelop, integrate and support features in the core server stack</p><p>· Develop and support data pipeline and infrastructure</p><p><br></p><p>This is onsite position post Covid in Austin TX.</p><p>Permanent position on W2 only.</p>
